roleset.name: determine the weight
roleset.note: WEIGH-V NOTES: Effectively this conflates two senses: "determine the weight of" and"have a certain weight". But they're so close! Member of Vncls register-54.1-1. (from weigh.01-v)

example.name: and they're proud of this?
example.text: Conner is supplying hard-disk drives for the machine, which *trace* weighs only six pounds and fits in a briefcase.

example.name: agentive, with yardstick
example.text: Mary weighed John's brain with a postal scale.

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ...traders said profit-taking weighed on the market, with blue-chips bearing the brunt of the selling.
example.arg: with blue-chips bearing the brunt of the selling

roleset.name: compare x and y, consider carefully
roleset.note: WEIGH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'weigh' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Many senses. Comparison to 'measure' and 'press'. (from weigh.04-v predicate notes)

example.name: as compare
example.text: The problem for [Congress]-3 will be [*-3]to weigh what China is saying to its people against the more conciliatory message it is delivering to the Bush administration.
example.arg: what China is saying to its people
against the more conciliatory message it is delivering to the Bush administration

example.name: as consider
example.text: Theoretically, [jurors]-1 are supposed [*-1]to weigh the evidence in a case logically and objectively.

example.name: our next caller...
example.text: Diamond Creek 1985 Lake Vineyard Cabernet weighed in this fall with a sticker price of $100 a bottle.
example.arg: with a sticker price of $100 a bottle
